column1: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the paneer cubes.cook the gravy till the paneer cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak paneer hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak paneer with some butter or cream also while serving.
column2: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the tofu cubes.cook the gravy till the tofu cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak tofu hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak tofu with some butter or cream also while serving.
column3: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the chervil cubes.cook the gravy till the chervil cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak chervil hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak chervil with some butter or cream also while serving.

column1: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the paneer cubes.cook the gravy till the paneer cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak paneer hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak paneer with some butter or cream also while serving.
column2: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the tofu cubes.cook the gravy till the tofu cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak tofu hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak tofu with some butter or cream also while serving.
column3: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the duck cubes.cook the gravy till the duck cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak duck hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak duck with some butter or cream also while serving.

column1: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the paneer cubes.cook the gravy till the paneer cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak paneer hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak paneer with some butter or cream also while serving.
column2: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the tofu cubes.cook the gravy till the tofu cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak tofu hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak tofu with some butter or cream also while serving.
column3: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the saffron cubes.cook the gravy till the saffron cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak saffron hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak saffron with some butter or cream also while serving.

column1: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the paneer cubes.cook the gravy till the paneer cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak paneer hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak paneer with some butter or cream also while serving.
column2: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the tofu cubes.cook the gravy till the tofu cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak tofu hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak tofu with some butter or cream also while serving.
column3: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the mache cubes.cook the gravy till the mache cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak mache hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak mache with some butter or cream also while serving.

column1: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the paneer cubes.cook the gravy till the paneer cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak paneer hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak paneer with some butter or cream also while serving.
column2: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the halloumi cubes.cook the gravy till the halloumi cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak halloumi hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak halloumi with some butter or cream also while serving.
column3: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the quark cubes.cook the gravy till the quark cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak quark hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak quark with some butter or cream also while serving.

column1: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the paneer cubes.cook the gravy till the paneer cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak paneer hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak paneer with some butter or cream also while serving.
column2: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the tofu cubes.cook the gravy till the tofu cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak tofu hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak tofu with some butter or cream also while serving.
column3: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the plant-based sausage cubes.cook the gravy till the plant-based sausage cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak plant-based sausage hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak plant-based sausage with some butter or cream also while serving.

column1: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the paneer cubes.cook the gravy till the paneer cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak paneer hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak paneer with some butter or cream also while serving.
column2: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the halloumi cubes.cook the gravy till the halloumi cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak halloumi hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak halloumi with some butter or cream also while serving.
column3: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the carnaroli rice cubes.cook the gravy till the carnaroli rice cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak carnaroli rice hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak carnaroli rice with some butter or cream also while serving.

column1: Nut roast: Set aside to cool.STEP 6Finally stir in 100g fresh breadcrumbs 150g chopped mixed nuts 3 lightly beaten large eggs 100g grated mature cheddar a handful of finely chopped flat-leaf parsley and a pinch of salt and some ground black pepper.STEP 7Stir to mix well then spoon the mixture into the prepared tin and press down the surface.STEP 8Cover with foil and bake for 30 mins then remove the foil and bake for a further 20 mins until firm when pressed gently.STEP 9Meanwhile to make the sauce heat 2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil very gently then add 2 finely sliced garlic cloves and 1 rosemary sprig and heat without colouring.STEP 10

column1: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the paneer cubes.cook the gravy till the paneer cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak paneer hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak paneer with some butter or cream also while serving.
column2: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the halloumi cubes.cook the gravy till the halloumi cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak halloumi hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak halloumi with some butter or cream also while serving.
column3: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the liver cubes.cook the gravy till the liver cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak liver hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak liver with some butter or cream also while serving.

column1: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the paneer cubes.cook the gravy till the paneer cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak paneer hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak paneer with some butter or cream also while serving.
column2: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the halloumi cubes.cook the gravy till the halloumi cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak halloumi hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak halloumi with some butter or cream also while serving.
column3: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the chicken cubes.cook the gravy till the chicken cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak chicken hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak chicken with some butter or cream also while serving.

column1: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the paneer cubes.cook the gravy till the paneer cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak paneer hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak paneer with some butter or cream also while serving.
column2: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the halloumi cubes.cook the gravy till the halloumi cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak halloumi hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak halloumi with some butter or cream also while serving.
column3: palak paneer  how to make palak paneer | paneer s: rinse the spinach very wall in water.boil water in a pan with some salt.switch off the fire and add the spinach leaves in the hot water.close with a lid and let the spinach leaves sit in the water for 2-3 mins.drain and immediately add the leaves in a pan or bowl containing ice cold water.this helps in preserving the green color of the spinach.drain and then puree the spinach in a blender or hand blender with ginger garlic and green chilies.make a smooth puree.heat oil or ghee in a pan or kadai.fry the cumin first.then add the bay leaves and onions.fry till the onions become browned.now add the garlic and tomatoes.fry till the tomatoes become soft.add the turmeric powder red chili powder and asafoetida.stir and fry for some seconds.add the spinach puree.add some water if required.simmer for 6-7 minutes or more till the spinach is cooked.lastly add salt and garam masala.stir and add the curry leaves cubes.cook the gravy till the curry leaves cubes become soft and succulent.add cream and stir.simmer for 30 seconds or a minute.at this stage you can also add some crushed kasuri methi leaves.stir and serve the palak curry leaves hot with some rotis naan or jeera rice.you can top the palak curry leaves with some butter or cream also while serving.
